title: Drawing, "David Milton Apartment 420 East 52nd Street: Rubber Inlay Table Top", August 2, 1937
medium: Graphite, pen and black ink on tracing paper
markings: Stamp in black ink at lower right: DONALD DESKEY/630 FIFTH AVENUE/NEW YORK CITY
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite with instructions throughout; inscribed in with design numbers throughout; inscribed in graphite in stamp: 6414 A.; FULL SIZE; DILLMAN / D[circled] / 8/2/37.; 8/2/37 1 W&J.; above stamp in graphite: F.S. DETAIL RUBBER INLAY TABLE #6414/EACH UNIT TO BE CUT FROM A SINGLE PC.; above at right: LIGHT/BLUE; DARK/BLUE; RED; WHITE; BROWN
description: Full size detail of table top design. Circular table with abstracted design at center, dark blue background. Design of wine glass (?) and abstracted musical instrument/number five, with colors in brown, dark blue, red, white, and light blue.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "David Milton Apartment 420 East 52nd Street: Rubber Inlay Table Top", August 2, 1937.
August 2, 1937. Graphite, pen and black ink on tracing paper. Gift of Donald Deskey. 1975-11-190.
